mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WD_COUPON(SEQ, TITLE, OPENDATE, CLOSEDATE, SHOUR, SMIN, TIMEREMIT, USERREMIT, DISCOUNT, SORT, DEL) VALUES(SEQ_WD_COUPON.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{opendate}, #{closedate}, #{shour}, #{smin}, #{timeremit}, #{userremit}, #{discount}, #{sort}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WD_COUPON WHERE SORT=${value} AND MONTHS_BETWEEN(OPENDATE,SYSDATE)>=0 AND DEL=0 ORDER BY SEQ DESC
SELECT * FROM WD_COUPON WHERE SORT=${value} ORDER BY SEQ DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE WD_COUPON SET DEL = 0 WHERE DEL = 1 AND SORT=#{sort}
UPDATE WD_COUPON SET DEL = 1 WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WD_COUPON WHERE SORT=1 AND DEL=1
SELECT * FROM WD_COUPON WHERE SORT=2 AND DEL=1 ORDER BY DISCOUNT ASC
SELECT * FROM WD_COUPON WHERE SORT=3 AND DEL=1
SELECT * FROM WD_COUPON WHERE SORT=4 AND DEL=1
mapper.update: UPDATE WD_COUPON SET DEL = 2 WHERE MONTHS_BETWEEN(CLOSEDATE,SYSDATE) < 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WD_USECOUPON(SEQ, CP_SEQ, MID, REMIT, DEL) VALUES(SEQ_WD_UC.NEXTVAL, #{cp_seq}, #{mid}, SYSDATE+#{remit}, #{del})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WD_USECOUPON WHERE CP_SEQ = #{cp_seq} AND MID = #{mid}
mapper.update: UPDATE WD_USECOUPON SET DEL = 1 WHERE MONTHS_BETWEEN(REMIT,SYSDATE) < 0
mapper.select: SELECT W.SEQ SEQ, CP_SEQ, REMIT, TITLE, DISCOUNT, BKSEQ FROM WD_USECOUPON W,WD_COUPON C WHERE MID = #{mid} AND W.DEL = 0 AND CP_SEQ = C.SEQ ORDER BY DISCOUNT DESC, CP_SEQ ASC
SELECT W.SEQ SEQ, CP_SEQ, REMIT, TITLE, DISCOUNT FROM WD_USECOUPON W,WD_COUPON C WHERE W.SEQ = #{seq} AND CP_SEQ = C.SEQ
